normalized: it was long past dark by the time we got back home.

black for me, and three scoops of sugar for annerose.

normalized: miki…"

normalized: i don't think that's possible.

normalized: ngh… kh…"

bitter tears well up and fall from her cheeks.

a witch and the immortal servant that protects her.

name: annerose
normalized: think it over carefully and decide.
what we'll be doing from here on.

normalized: ooh… ngh… kh… snff…"

normalized: miki…"

normalized: rikurou…"

normalized: miki, i…"

normalized: um… are you okay?
well, i know you're not, but… i just…"

normalized: i'm not… but sitting out here's helped cool my head off a little.

normalized: i see…"

normalized: hm…?

normalized: i'm just wondering if somewhere in this city, my brother's looking at the moon like this, too.

normalized: right?
hehe…"

the death of her brother, who had become an inhuman, demonic beast.

no… that's all someone like me can do.
someone who has also strayed from the path of humanity.
